FuncDef: The reset sdn openflow statistics command clears statistics about the OpenFlow connection packets. The reset sdn openflow statistics command clears statistics about the OpenFlow connection packets. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: reset sdn openflow statistics [ controller [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] { <ipv4-address> | <ipv6-address> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the VPN instance that the controller belongs to.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the controller's IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the controller's IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.
